titles.title: A joint resolution to express the disfavor of Congress regarding the proposed agreement for cooperation between the United States and the People's Republic of China transmitted to the Congress by the President on April 21, 2015, pursuant to the Atomic Energy Act of 1954.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged pursant to 42 U.S.C. 2159(i) and Section 601(b)(4) of P.L. 94-329.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 154.
